entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. 60 percent chance of snow over northern sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
